response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its worth but also provides an opportunity for both of us to achieve a fair transaction. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 9500}
